5 8 8 25 9 9 25 10 10 25 10 5 from cast on edge measuring straight down center front fit tip put yoke stitches on waste yarn and try on to see if the yoke is the right length for you work additional rounds if necessary to bring the yoke to the correct length before separating the body and sleeves separate body and sleeves knit 44 50 54 60 65 70 74 79 sts put next 56 62 66 72 74 82 92 94 sts on waste yarn for sleeve cast on 8 8 10 10 12 12 14 14 sts knit 88 100 108 120 130 140 148 158 sts put next 56 62 66 72 74 82 92 94 sts on waste yarn for sleeve cast on 8 8 10 10 12 12 14 14 sts knit to end of round 192 216 236 260 284 304 324 344 sts on the needle work even until body measures 11 from underarm or 1 5 less than desired length fit tip put body stitches on waste yarn and try on to see if the body is the right length for you work additional rounds if necessary to bring the body to the correct length before working the ribbing bottom body ribbing change to circular needle two sizes smaller than gauge needle if you are changing colors for the ribbing knit one round in ribbing color before starting the ribbing round 1 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end of round work round 1 a total of 10 times bind off loosely in pattern sleeves make two transfer sleeve sts to gauge needle for working small circumferences beginning at center of underarm pick up and knit 4 4 5 5 6 6 7 7 sts knit across sleeve sts pick up and knit 4 4 5 5 6 6 7 7 sts pm for bor 64 70 76 82 86 94 106 108 sts work even in stockinette st until sleeve measures 3 3 3 3 5 3 5 3 75 3 75 4 from underarm or desired length the next round adjusts the stitch count on sizes b d e f and g for the bottom sleeve ribbing k2 k2tog knit to last 4 sts ssk k2 64 68 76 80 84 92 104 108 sts 4 bottom sleeve ribbing
